channel.title: Almost done, can almost play... Wait nope
channel.description:
I've been trying to play MoparScape for a while, and yesterday I came really close. I downloaded everything I needed and I got to the part where it downloads Mopar in the loader that looks like RuneScape (The 16mb download.) And just so you know I have dial up... So 16mb is about 3 hours worth of downloading. And after it dowloads it for a bit (like up to 5%) It closes it out. So that means I have to restart the entire download again. Can anyone tell me how to get this stupid thing working?!
Ps~ I can't buy a different internet. [br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2007, 06:50:50 AM[/size][hr]And my comp doesn't disconnect, it literally just closes out without me touching anything. [br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2007, 06:52:15 AM[/size][hr]Got to go school, if you know how to help, please post and I will read later.

item.title: Almost done, can almost play... Wait nope
item.dc:creator: @curse63 curse63
item.description:
@curse63 wrote:

1- Maybe your firewall is OK with everything in the mopar download,until it reahces 5%.Then it detects something it finds agaisnt it,and closes the download because it thinks it’s harmfull.Check your firewall,what it blocks,and what moparscape has in it.

2- Mayve your computer is too old.

3-You have a virus that prevents downloads,or a virus that messes up your computer.

Read full topic
